author: Imogen West-Knights, Simon Childs
title: The New Rules of Social Media in the Age of Social Distancing
description: Social media has become a way to show that you're staying inside, and checking up on others.
content:
This article originally appeared on VICE UK.
We have now reached the stage where posting an outdoors selfie is one of the most incendiary things you can do on social media. Is this your garden you're sunbathing in? If you're in the park, are youI can scarcel… [+5179 chars]
